post_content:
New to the community here.  Looking to start my collection by focusing on Chicago White Sox/American team set.  Will consider all backs but trying to diversify getting as many different ones as possible.   

Looking for SGC graded on the HOFers (at least 1.5), raw on the others.

Please send me asking price and pictures.

Thank you!
You should contact Paul Curlee (he is a member here). He has an extensive t206 WS collection. And he’s a great guy 😀

Welcome to the forum! You picked a good team to start with. :)  I began my T206 White Sox set about 15 years ago.

Unfortunately, I don't have any extras right now.

Good luck with your set!
